channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In a striking reversal, Tesla CEO Elon Musk donates to Trump’s reelection bid
item.description: Musk has yet to publicly endorse a candidate in the 2024 race.

item.title: The Ambani wedding is costing millions — here's how to have a big impact on a much smaller budget
item.description: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding cost millions, but wedding planners say you can have a glamorous wedding on a much smaller budget.

item.title: Did hackers get your cell number from AT&T? Be on the lookout for these scams.
Stunning tourist paradise marred by fatal plane crashes
item.description: The latest helicopter crash in Kauai came after a series of deadly accidents last year.

item.title: AT&T's massive data breach deepens crisis for Snowflake seven weeks after hack was disclosed
item.description: AT&T is the most high-profile company tied to Snowflake's cyberattack that the company disclosed in May.

item.title: Postage rates are set to climb to 73 cents. Why snail-mail loyalists don’t mind.
Bank profits slide as people struggle with debt
item.description: JPMorgan set aside $3.1 billion to cover potentially bad loans, up sharply from a year earlier, as delinquencies climb among some Americans.

item.title: Big youth climate group calls for Biden to exit election race against Trump
item.description: President Joe Biden says he will remain in the 2024 election race against Donald Trump, but more allies are calling him to quit.

item.title: Meta to lift restrictions on Trump’s accounts ahead of election
The world’s top crude exporter has quadrupled imports of fuel oil to the highest level in more than 3 years
item.description: Shipments of fuel oil rose in June to the most since at least the end of 2020, and are expected to remain elevated this month.

item.title: This week's most overbought stocks include several real estate names and a regional bank
item.description: A better-than-expected consumer inflation report led investors to buy rate-sensitive stocks such as REITs and industrials.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock bounces back — and could rally another 30%, analyst says
The world’s top HR association cuts ‘equity’ from its diversity program amid DEI backlash
item.description: The Society for Human Resources Management said it will be adopting the acronym “I&D” — or inclusion and diversity — and removing the “E” from its previous “IE&D” strategy.

item.title: Here's the deflation breakdown for June 2024 — in one chart
item.description: Prices have fallen for physical goods, gasoline, airfare and some grocery items like apples since June 2023, according to the consumer price index.

item.title: U.S. stocks end higher Friday, post gains for the week on rate-cut optimism
